entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
